North_Little_Rock.Kahn-Jennings House: The Kahn-Jennings House is a historic house at 5300 Sherwood Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a large 2-1/2 story structure, finished in stone, that was designed to resemble a large English country house. It was designed by Little Rock architect Max Mayer for Sidney Kahn, the real estate developer of the Prospect Terrace area in which it is located.
